YOUR GO-TO SPOT
FOR AUTHENTIC CHINESE CUISINE

Enjoy our Exclusive Chinese Food Collection
Authentic Flavors, Right Here

Vanchu Hut is here to satisfy every craving with a menu t hat brings the taste of China right to your neighborhood.
Our restaurant is dedicated to serving up the best Chinese food in Pratap Vihar., where every dish is crafted with fresh ingredients.

Our Top Dishes

Explore our menu and you’ll find a selection of popular Chinese dishes that locals love. From our famous dumplings to vegetarian options and the classic chowmein, each dish is made to impress. Looking for a quick meal? Try our takeout options for a delicious Chinese food experience at home!

A Perfect Spot for Your Family and Friends

Ready to enjoy a meal that hits the spot? Visit us at Vanchu Hut in Pratap Vihar or place an order for delivery straight to your door. We’re here to make sure every bite is memorable, whether you’re dining in or enjoying our Chinese food in the comfort of your home.

Order or Book Your Table Today!
